data.name: FluentXR
data.description:
Unlock a personalized language learning journey with FluentXR. Using mixed reality passthrough technology, FluentXR transforms your home into an interactive learning space. 

Step into a realm where learning is not just fun and effective, but also deeply personalized. FluentXR is not just another language learning app; it's your own private linguistics lab. 

Tag real-world objects in your space with text and audio labels, making learning immersive and contextually relevant. Dive into our Word Shuffle mini-game to reinforce your skills and beat the timer. 

Current Features:
Tagging Language: English
Learning Language: French
Mini-Game: Word Shuffle
470+ available tags geared towards common living room objects such as “Couch”, “Television”, and “Gaming Console”

FluentXR is an ever-evolving platform, continually expanding its selection of languages and mini-games. Achieve language mastery with FluentXR—where your home becomes your classroom.
